content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the relationship between the fourth and fifth sentences (“Of course . . . measurement”) of the final paragraph?

choices.label: The fifth sentence rebuts an objection raised in the preceding sentence.
The fifth sentence elaborates on an assertion made in the preceding sentence.
The fifth sentence qualifies a claim put forward in the preceding sentence.
The fifth sentence acknowledges the limitations of a method that the fourth sentence advocates.

content.answer: The fifth sentence elaborates on an assertion made in the preceding sentence.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
